GameConditionDef.label: wildfire
GameConditionDef.description: Wildfire

GameConditionDef.label: Cold superstorm
GameConditionDef.description: Huge heavy clouds covered your territory, depriving you of sunlight, and causing incredible temperature phenomena in your territory, including severe freezing, hail and the threat of hypothermia. Wear a hat!
GameConditionDef.endMessage: Hopefully, the cold superstorm has finished.

GameConditionDef.label: Inferno
GameConditionDef.description: An extremely powerful heat wave travels across the area, increasing the likelihood of droughts and forest fires. Take care of your head!
GameConditionDef.endMessage: Hopefully, the inferno accident has finished.

GameConditionDef.label: Sandstorm
GameConditionDef.description: Sandstorm is coming!\n\nPowerful dust vortices will cut a path of destruction through the area.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The sandstorm has finished, dust vortices are gone.

GameConditionDef.label: Ice vortex
GameConditionDef.description: Ice vortex is found.\n\nPowerful ice vortices can cause freezing to living creatures.

GameConditionDef.label: toxic weather
GameConditionDef.description: Toxic rain due to toxic emissions from some distant source is falling over this entire region. Any living thing not under a roof will be slowly poisoned, and items left outside will may corrode.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a cloud of toxic fallout will blanket the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], killing outdoor plant and animal life
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The worst of the toxic rain has finished.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A distant chemical fire has released a plume of poison over this entire region.\n\nAny person or creature not under a roof will be slowly sickened by the toxic rain.

GameConditionDef.label: Hail Storm
GameConditionDef.description: A freak, small scale hail storm is ravaging the local area. Any person or creature not hiding under the roof risks getting injured by ice pellets.

GameConditionDef.label: Drought
GameConditionDef.description:
An unusual drought has set in.
Drought is devastating for plant life and will quickly destroy all the crops not planted in the hydroponics. Be sure to quickly harvest any plants you can.

GameConditionDef.label: Ice Age
GameConditionDef.description:
Atmospheric composition of the planet drastically changed resulting in a significant drop in temperature.
Flora and Fauna is suffering from these changes as biomes shift into their colder counterparts. Resources become scarce, forcing factions into conflict.
It will last anywhere between a season to several years.

GameConditionDef.label: Global Warming
GameConditionDef.description:
Global temperatures have suddenly risen to dangerous levels.
Flora and Fauna is suffering from these changes as biomes shift into their warmer counterparts. Resources become scarce, forcing factions into conflict.
It will last anywhere between a season to several years.

GameConditionDef.label: Psychic Rain
GameConditionDef.description:
A dangerous psychic entity caused disturbance on subatomic levels, resonating across all particles of the atmosphere.
A seemingly endless supernatural rain has begun, altering the very composition of time. Any person or creature not under the roof will age significantly faster.
It will last anywhere between a season to several years.

GameConditionDef.label: Long Night
GameConditionDef.description:
A space entity of unimaginable size has covered a local star, resulting in a long lasting eclipse.
Terrified of this supernatural phenomenon, other factions will use this time to wage war and conflict across the surface.
It will last anywhere between a season to several years.

GameConditionDef.label: Unusual cold
GameConditionDef.description: An unusual cold snap is freezing the region.

GameConditionDef.label: Nuclear fallout
GameConditionDef.description: You colony has been struck by a low-yield nuclear weapon, in addition to the explosion, it has lofted a plume of radioactive particles into the lower atmosphere, blocking sunlight and irradiating the area. Temperatures will be lowered and exposed people and animals will take radiation damage.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: Congratulations! Radiation soon goes to natural normal level. If you have received this message, probably you are one of the best Rimworld players!

GameConditionDef.label: Radiation effect
GameConditionDef.description: Too much radiation from the solar flare has triggered cosmic radiation.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: It seems radiation effect soon goes to normal level.

GameConditionDef.label: Epidemic
GameConditionDef.description: In our area, an epidemic of disease.

GameConditionDef.label: Darkness
GameConditionDef.description: An unusual dark and cold... night.

GameConditionDef.label: eclipse
GameConditionDef.description: An eclipse is shadowing the surface. It will be dark, even during the daytime.
GameConditionDef.letterText: One of the moons of this planet has orbited in front of the sun. An eclipse has begun.

GameConditionDef.label: cold snap
GameConditionDef.description: An unusual cold snap is freezing the region.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a front of cold air will cool the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], harming crops and any person or animal without adequate protection
GameConditionDef.letterText: An unusual cold snap has set in.\n\nCold snaps can quickly kill by hypothermia. Be sure to build a heated space to survive, wear appropriate apparel, and try to harvest crops before they freeze and die.

GameConditionDef.label: heat wave
GameConditionDef.description: An extreme wave of heat is baking the area.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a heat wave will bake the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], harming crops and possibly killing people or animals in uncooled areas
GameConditionDef.letterText: An unusual heat wave has begun.\n\nHeat waves can induce deadly heatstroke. Stay cool by building either a passive or electric cooler, or by getting deep underground where the rocks are naturally cool.

GameConditionDef.label: sun blocked
GameConditionDef.description: A nearby sun blocker machine is turning the upper atmosphere opaque, blocking the sun.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A sun blocker machine has begun blocking the sun.

GameConditionDef.label: storyteller frenzy
GameConditionDef.description: You have angered the storyteller, we shouldn't expect anything good in the future.

GameConditionDef.label: storyteller frenzy
GameConditionDef.description: You have angered the storyteller, we shouldn't expect anything good in the future.

GameConditionDef.label: Seismic activity
GameConditionDef.description: Underground shocks of a certain intensity.

GameConditionDef.label: bombardment
GameConditionDef.description: Enemy faction are not pleased with you.. so they will bomb you to hell.

GameConditionDef.label: beam strike
GameConditionDef.description: Enemy faction are not pleased with you.. so they will bomb you to hell.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The beam strike threat is over.
